patcher_initiating_soft_repair: Sorry! We've detected a problem with your installation. We will now attempt to repair the affected files.
patcher_error_failed_to_write: We couldn't write files to your installation folder. This error can usually be solved by freeing up disk space and trying again.
patcher_disconnected: You're unable to play because you may be offline.
patcher_gameflow_disabled: We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again.
patcher_gameflow_bad_registration_single: We're having trouble talking to some League servers. If this problem persists, please reach out to Player Support with error code: {{errorCodes}}.
patcher_gameflow_bad_registration_plural: We're having trouble talking to some League servers. If this problem persists, please reach out to Player Support with error codes: {{errorCodes}}.
patcher_no_queues: All queues are currently disabled. If the client is otherwise ok, exit and re-open it to try again.
patcher_player_time_banned: You're banned! You'll be able to play again in {{days}} day(s).
patcher_player_banned: You're banned! Relog to see your ban duration and reform card.
patcher_player_in_tournament: You can't play other game modes while you're locked into Clash.
patcher_migration_modal_body: We're moving League's files around so our new, faster, stabler patcher can get to 'em. This might take a few minutes, but it's a one-time thing. More info {{link}} if you need it!
patcher_hanging_text: You don't appear to be connected to our download servers.
patcher_os_check_failed: You are on an unsupported Operating System. Please see our min spec for more details.
patcher_update_direct_x: You are using an outdated version of DirectX. Please update your version of DirectX or upgrade your hardware if necessary to continue playing.
patcher_update_mac_metal: League requires a version of Metal graphics that your Mac does not support. Please use a device that supports more current Metal graphics versions to continue playing.
